column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Last night I decided to take a bath instead of a shower .
#id=2
#text=I made sure to put the stopper in the bathtub , so no water would drain out .
#id=3
#text=Then I adjusted the water temperature so it was n't too hot , or too cold , then let the bathtub fill all the way up to the top .
#id=4
#text=I then gathered up my pajamas to put on after the bath was over .
#id=5
#text=I got a clean towel , and brought everything into the bathroom .
#id=6
#text=I checked the water temperature , took all my clothes off , and jumped right in .
#id=7
#text=I lounged around in the tub for awhile , then soaped up my hair and rinsed it off .
#id=8
#text=Then I cleaned my body with a bar of soap until I had every single part clean .
#id=9
#text=At this point the water was starting to get a bit cold , so I decided it was time to get out .
#text=I pulled the water stopper so the water would drain out , then I dried myself off with the towel , and got into my pajamas .
